title: Protocol Village: Nomic's 'nBTC Interchain Upgrade' Brings Bitcoin Into Cosmos Ecosystem
description: The latest in blockchain tech upgrades, funding announcements and deals. For the week of Oct. 2-8, with live updates throughout.

title: UK Financial Watchdog Hints at New Crypto Sandbox for Next Year
description: Once it is given its powers by the Treasury, the FCA will use the UK’s upcoming crypto sandbox to draft comprehensive legislation.

title: Declining open interest in futures market contrasts Bitcoin’s bullish rally
description:
The futures market has traditionally been a barometer for investor sentiment. Open interest, representing the total number of outstanding futures contracts that have not been settled, is a measure of market activity. Historically, rising Bitcoin prices have been correlated with an increase in open interest, signaling heightened speculative activity. However, Bitcoin’s recent ascent past $28,000 […]

The post Declining open interest in futures market contrasts Bitcoin’s bullish rally appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Is like a ‘New Industrial Revolution’ That’s ‘Here to Stay’, Says UK Member of Parliament
description: A UK Member of Parliament has recently said that the cryptocurrency space is like a “new industrial revolution” that’s “here to stay” during a recent conversation on future-proofing the digital asset industry, in which she noted the UK has been moving to become a crypto hub. During a panel on CCData’s CCDAS conference in London, […]

title: Polygon zkEVM Welcomes Powerloom’s Incentivized Testnet: Pioneering Web3 Onchain Data
description: Powerloom is launching Phase 2 of its incentivized testnet, aiming to test the network’s operations, reliability, and security with broader community involvement. The initiative will span roughly 45 to 60 days, offering rewards from 1,000,000 tokens to participants who engage in various on-chain activities and quests. title: TON (Toncoin) and Transak Forge Powerful Partnership for Global Crypto Access
description: The Ton blockchain and the Transak developer integration toolkit have struck a new collaboration that focuses on strengthening crypto adoption at a global scale.  The move places TON in a positive light, as a superior blockchain technology with global appeal.   The Open Network (TON) network has partnered with Transak, a leading Web3 onboarding solution. title: Sam Bankman-Fried Trial: Prosecution vs. Defense in Explaining Crypto
description:
The prosecutor’s path to success may be more difficult than many people realize as the Sam Bankman-Fried trial reaches a new high point, according to a Wall Street Journal report. In particular, jurors sitting on the case may have little crypto knowledge, which the report said the defense may use to their advantage. Jury selection […]
